Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to produce event log integrating tables. Steps: Identify cases = order_id. Derive activities: Order Created, Item Picked (maybe per line), Order Dispatched (per delivery), Order Arrived (per delivery), Invoice Issued (per invoice), Payment Received (per payment). Also could include Order Delivered maybe combine dispatch+arrival as separate events. Resource column: map sales_person_id for order created, picker_id for picking, carrier_id for dispatch/arrival? For arrival maybe same carrier. Billing person for invoice, payment method maybe resource? Use resource table to map names.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to output markdown table with columns: Case ID, Activity, Timestamp, Resource, Other Attributes (maybe order_priority, item_id, quantity, delivery_note, invoice_amount, payment_method, etc). Provide one row per event. We must ensure chronological order per case. For each order, list events sorted by timestamp.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to handle multiple items: could create separate events per item picking. Thats fine. Multiple deliveries: each delivery has dispatch and arrival events. Multiple invoices and payments: each invoice event and each payment event. Assumptions: If multiple items picking same order, separate events. If multiple deliveries, each dispatch/arrival separate.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND

For other attributes, include maybe order_priority for Order Created, item_id, quantity for picking, delivery_note for dispatch/arrival, invoice_amount for invoice, payment_method for payment. Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Well map resource names using Resources table. Resources mapping: SP-001 Alice Brown SP-002 Bob Smith SP-003 Charlie Kim WH-001 David Lin WH-002 Eva Johnson WH-003 Frank Miller CR-01 GlobalTransport CR-02 FastShip CR-03 AirExpress BL-001 Gina Carter BL-002 Harry Lee BL-003 Irene Park For payment method, we could put method as resource column (or attribute). Well put method in Attributes, and maybe resource column blank for payments, and include method in attributes. Now construct table. Will need to ensure proper markdown formatting. Lets produce rows.
